## Keys for Netlify Deployment

Copy the key and the corresponding value into your Netlify site settings under **Site settings > Build & deploy > Environment > Environment variables**.

---

### 1. Firebase API Key

**Key:**
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY

**Value:**
AIzaSyCCFAEpy3lk4WSwc0P3txrN0RwFHtdVuOI

---

### 2. Firebase Auth Domain

**Key:**
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN

**Value:**
jtt-drive-lite.firebaseapp.com

---

### 3. Firebase Project ID

**Key:**
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID

**Value:**
jtt-drive-lite

---

### 4. Firebase Storage Bucket

**Key:**
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET

**Value:**
jtt-drive-lite.firebasestorage.app

---

### 5. Firebase Messaging Sender ID

**Key:**
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID

**Value:**
484785132766

---

### 6. Firebase App ID

**Key:**
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID

**Value:**
1:484785132766:web:21da6be7bb835bcc105e4f

---

### 7. Pinata API Key

**Key:**
PINATA_API_KEY

**Value:**

**Key:**
PINATA_API_SECRET

**Value:**
